titleStmt.title: Great Brittans ruine plotted by seven sorts of men; discoved [sic] and counter plotted: in which is contained a probable way for the happy and peaceable composing of all the distempers of the time, with articles for the finding out of scandalous ministers. commended in a letter to a friend, and now recommended to the Honourable Parliaments consideration. By a true-hearted well-wisher to great Brittanes happinesse.
titleStmt.author: True-hearted well-wisher to Great Brittanes happinesse.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Vnderhill, and are to be sold at the signe of the Bible in Woodstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Bible in Woodstreet
